6ec1e300-9646-4a54-b345-c014b5422696.description: This exam is for a system integrator and/or implementation & configuration professional who can design and configure an HCM solution in Ceridian Core HR. This exam will validate the skills and knowledge needed to design and configure an HCM solution in the areas of: Organizational Structure; HR Records & Key Elements; Data Mapping Rules; Pay Groups; Management Structure; Application Security & Global Settings; Self-service Workflows & Managing Forms; and Troubleshooting.
6ec1e300-9646-4a54-b345-c014b5422696.name: Ceridian Certified Consultant - Dayforce Core HR

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass proctored exam consisting of scenario-based questions in a multiple-choice format. By passing this exam the developer will earn the Ceridian Certified Consultant - HR Core credential.

e3a57790-7e16-4dad-8f93-2610ad99d5dd.description: With this badge person understands the rules of engagement between Ceridian and Ceridian Partner Ecosystem (CPN), as well as the benefits of a mutual collaboration. e3a57790-7e16-4dad-8f93-2610ad99d5dd.name: Ceridian Qualified Professional - Dayforce Sales Foundations

76064572-f919-49c3-a8bb-6efeb5ea644c.description: Earners of this badge demonstrate proficiency in managing complex and global projects in Ceridian to deliver value and benefits to customers. They are aware of familiar issues facing HCM projects and can identify solutions, prioritize issues, and develop/manage integrates and actionable plan.
76064572-f919-49c3-a8bb-6efeb5ea644c.name: Ceridian Qualified Professional Complex Projects Insights

04eebb2a-d7fe-4bd4-99af-eb6f7f9cbde5.description: Earners of this badge have advanced understanding of the Ceridian Dayforce Methodology which is tailored and vetted for HCM implementation projects. They can confidently apply industry best practices in HCM projects. They effectively manage stakeholders, utilize templates and tools, and able to help teams and customer in decision making. The badge covers: Understanding of DF Methodology and Governance. Understanding of DF Methodology tools, templates, and artifacts.
04eebb2a-d7fe-4bd4-99af-eb6f7f9cbde5.name: Ceridian Qualified Professional Dayforce Project Methodology

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of two courses. * Dayforce Methodology and Governance* Learning Validation Checkpoint

77240a70-caa7-43b3-9289-a8ec10145182.description: Earners of this badge understand the Ceridian organization, strategy, and values. They know responsibilities of different teams and they interact together. On the other, earners of the badge have full awareness of HCM solutions and ecosystem, especially the features and value add the Ceridian Dayforce offers to the industry. They confidently engage with clients and provide SME advice to the customer to improve HCM implementation experience.
77240a70-caa7-43b3-9289-a8ec10145182.name: Ceridian Qualified Professional Landscape & Products

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completing the following courses. * The Ceridian Landscape* Dayforce Product Features and Value Add* Dayforce Product Landscape* Learning Validation Checkpoint

a84b3438-503e-4fab-a422-d8e857484a4c.description: Earners of this badge are emerging leaders. They aspiration and lead with passion. They effectively mentor, coach, and motivate peers to improve and grow. They communicate clearly and effectively across different levels and negotiate with integrity.

b6c05a6c-3b72-4dca-900b-ce54df6f9e36.description: Earners of this badge have strong understanding of the importance of strong rapport and communications within teams. b6c05a6c-3b72-4dca-900b-ce54df6f9e36.name: Ceridian Qualified Professional Leadership - Foundation

bf7e3557-9360-4a0a-b221-49178e61c22f.description: Earners of this badge demonstrate expert understanding of HCM projects lifecycle. 4c73520d-e3ef-46ce-8e13-d64ba2fcf956.description: Earners of this badge have expert knowledge and practice to effectively manage projects budgets. 938744a9-e154-46f8-8eb9-c050b6b9da11.name: Ceridian Certified Consultant - Payroll Canada
